attributes.action: Sack Environment Agency chairman Sir Philip Dilley for flood watch alert failure
attributes.background: Over the Xmas period the River Irwell broke it's banks, bringing the worst flooding in 70 years to Salford. I was lucky as my property escaped flooding by 6m. I like many across the UK signed up to the flood watch alert system. I received no warning! EA Chairman Sir Philip Dilley is responsible!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could submit a petition about that.
